bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Overhead Pad-Mounted, Dry Vault, and Submersible Automatic Circuit Reclosers and Fault Interrupters for Alternating Current Systems Up to 38 kV--Corrigendum 1
IEEE Standard Requirements for Overhead Pad-Mounted, Dry Vault, and Submersible Automatic Circuit Reclosers and Fault Interrupters for Alternating Current Systems Up to 38 kV--Corrigendum 1
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.60-2003/Cor 1-2004 (Corrigendum to IEEE Std C37.60-2003)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Required definitions, ratings, procedures for performing design tests, production tests, and construction requirements for overhead, pad-mounted, dry vault, and submersible automatic circuit reclosers and fault interrupters for alternating systems up to 38 kV are specified.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
